title: Video: Braids – Lammicken
body:
This new video from **Mark Webber** for **Braids** psychedelic pop track _Lammicken_ perfectly captures the other worldly feel emanated by the song.

Beautiful and moving at the same time, the vibrant colours and patterns morph elegantly in time to the music, creating a visual experience that is both unique and fitting. Much like finding shapes in the clouds, the viewer is encouraged to search for images and recognisable traits, with each viewing provoking new discoveries. Check out the video for _Lammicken_ below.

[BRAIDS – Lammicken](http://vimeo.com/27166159) from [Mark Webber](http://vimeo.com/markwebber) on [Vimeo](http://vimeo.com).
